Steps.Description: Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick;
If opponent uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Gyro Ball, switch into Poliwrath
If Lapras comes out, Belly Drum. If Golduck is sent out, let it use Toxic on you then use Ice Punch on Vileplume
If opponent swaps to Vileplume, switch to Blissey and use Trick
If opponent does not swap out, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance then sweep

If opponent switches out into Dewgong while you are setting up, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum. If Golduck is sent out, let it use Toxic on you (use Drain Punch), then use Ice Punch on Vileplume then sweep
If opponent switches out into Lapras comes out, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum. If Golduck is sent out, let it use Toxic on you (use Belly Drum), then use Ice Punch on Vileplume then sweep
If opponent switches out intoswitches out into Dewgong, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum. If Golduck is sent out, let it use Toxic on you (use Belly Drum), then use Ice Punch on Vileplume then sweep
If opponent switches out into Chansey, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Dragonite, use Stealth Rock then switch to Blissey Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Golduck, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum then sweep
If opponent switches into Hariyama, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Lapras
and you get an Expert Belt, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind then sweep
If opponent used Waterfall, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
and you get a Rocky Helmet, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Hariyama, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Nidoking, switch into Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Lapras, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Slowbro, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure
If opponent stays, 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Dragonite, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Then switch back to Chandelure  3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Vileplume, switch into Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock.  Switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick;
If opponent stays, switch to Blissey Stealth Rock
If opponent switches out into Exeggutor, switch into Chandelure then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Lapras, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Exeggutor, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Lapras, use Stealth Rock then switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep

Use Trick;
If opponent uses Drill Run, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep.
If opponent switches into Mantine, switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock.
If opponent switches into Lapras, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Golduck, switch to Chandelure then switch back to Blissey Trick. Switch to Chandelure again then 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Exeggutor comes out, switch to Metagross Trick. Switch to Chandelure once more then 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Lapras comes out again, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Hydro Pump
and you get a Choice Specs, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
and you get a Life Orb, switch to Blissey Trick then switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Surf
and you get a Choice Scarf, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
and you get a Rocky Helmet, switch into Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum then sweep

If opponent switches into Claydol, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick, then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed. Use Shadow Ball vs. Hariyama

If opponent uses Water Spout, switch to Blissey then switch to Metagross Trick
If opponent switches out into Gliscor, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Blastoise, switch again to Blissey Trick as it locks Hitmonlee. Switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Machamp, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross Trick as it locks Dynamic Punch. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

If opponent switches into Torterra, switch into Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Machamp, use Earthquake to kill. Switch into Chandelure as it switches out into Darmanitan
If opponent uses Flare Blitz, 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Superpower, 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Use Trick;
If opponent uses Fire Punch, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Flamethrower, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick;
If Metagross takes less than 50% HP, use Stealth Rock then switch to switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If Metagross takes more than 50% HP, switch to Blissey and use Trick. switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep

Use Trick;
If you get a Chesto Berry
And opponent uses Drain Punch, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
And opponent uses Dynamic Punch, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If you get a Flame Orb
And opponent uses Drain Punch, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
And opponent uses Payback, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
If you get a Leftovers
And opponent uses Drain Punch, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
And opponent uses Dynamic Punch, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Eelektross, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent into Salamence
And opponent has Intimidate, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
And opponent has Moxie, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Slowbro, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Steelix, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick;
If opponent uses Earthquake, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Hammer Arm, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Salamence, switch into Blissey and use Trick
If opponent stays, use Softboiled as Metagross comes out. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches back to Metagross, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

If opponent uses Meteor Mash, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure and use Flamethrower. SWitch into Excadrill then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Eelektross, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Gliscor, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Blastoise, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Machamp, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross Trick as it locks Dynamic Punch. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Salamence
And opponent has Intimidate, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
And opponent has Moxie, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Torterra, switch to Excadrill then Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Machamp, use Earthquake. It will send in Darmanitan, so switch into Chandelure then sweep
If opponent uses Flare Blitz, 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Superpower, 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick, and use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Use Swords Dance + X.Speed
If Salamence has Moxie, use Trick
If you get a Life Orb, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Use Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If you get a Lum Berry, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Use Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If Salamence has Intimidate, switch to Blissey then switch to Metagross
If opponent stays, switch again to Blissey and use Stealth Rock
If opponent still stays, switch back to Metagross and use Trick then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Krookodile, switch into Excadrill then switch into Metagross Trick. Switch back to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Use Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Machamp, switch into Chandelure then switch into Metagross Trick
If opponent uses Drain Punch, switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Payback, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Salamence again,switch back into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Metagross, switch into Chandelure then switch into your own Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Salamence once more, switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch once more into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Slowbro, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Aggron, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Hitmonchan, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speedd then sweep
If opponent switches out into Machamp, switch into Chandelure then switch into Metagross Trick. Switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent witches out into Krookodile, use Trick
If opponent stays, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Use 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Salamence again, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Machamp, use Trick
If opponent uses Drain Punch, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Payback, Stealth Rock then switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Metagross, use Trick
If opponent locks into Hammer Arm, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Salamence again, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Use Softboiled twice so Metagross is forced out. Switch back into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Salamence, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Slowbro, use Trick then use Stealth Rock. Switch back into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick, then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

If players gets Metal Coat, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

If opponent switches out into Machamp while you set up, use Earthquake to kill it. Darmanitan comes out, so switch to Chandelure

If opponent stays, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

If opponent switches into Hydreigon, switch into Blissey then switch into the second Metagross and use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep (Use Shadow Ball vs. Gengar)
Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep (Use Shadow Ball vs. Gengar)
Stealth Rock
If opponent switches out into Krookodile, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Rotom-W, switch to Blissey then use Softboiled. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Switch into Blissey
If opponent uses Flamethrower, use Trick then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Shadow Ball, use Trick
If opponent uses Focus Blast, switch to Metagross and use Trick
If opponent switches into Marowak, Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Marowak, Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep (Use Iron Head vs. Gengar)
If opponent switches out into Muk, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep (Use Flamethrower vs. Gengar)
If opponent switches out to Lucario/Toxicroak,  switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + 2x X.Speed then sweep (If Houndoom is not dead, use Flamethrower vs. Gengar)

If opponent switches out into Krookodile, switch into switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out to Lucario, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + 2x X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Muk, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Use Iron Head vs. Gengar. If it gets Cursed Body and Gyarados comes out, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Marowak, switch into  Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Use Iron Head vs. Gengar. If it gets Cursed Body and Rotom-Frost comes out, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out to Toxicroak, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out to Hydreigon is sent out, switch to Metagross and use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick;
If opponent stays, switch into Blissey Trick then switch into Excadrill
If opponent uses Bonemerang, 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep (Use Iron Head vs. Gengar)
If opponent uses Double Edge, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Marowak/Rotom, switch into  Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep (Use Iron Head vs. Gengar)
If opponent switches out into Umbreon, switch into Blissey Trick. Switch into  Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep (Use Iron Head vs. Gengar)
Use Thunder Punch then switch to Excadrill
If Gyarados didnt die, use Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If Seismitoad is sent out, 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Switch into Blissey Trick
If opponent switches out into Crobat, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Krookodile, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out to Lucario/Toxicroak,  switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind +  X.Speed then sweep (If Houndoom is not dead, use Flamethrower vs. Gengar)
Switch into Blissey then switch into Metagross and use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent has Moxie, switch into Excadrill using Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep (EQ Gengar)
If opponent has Intimidate, use Trick then switch into Excadrill using Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep (If Houndoom is not dead, use Flamethrower vs. Gengar)
Use Trick;
If opponent uses Aura Sphere, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep (If Houndoom is not dead, use Flamethrower vs. Gengar)
If opponent uses Close Combat, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep (Use Shadow Ball vs. Gengar)

If opponent stays, switch into Blissey Trick. Switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep (If Houndoom is not dead, use Flamethrower vs. Gengar)
If opponent switches out into Krookodile, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock. Switch into Blissey Trick then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Seismitoad, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches back to Mandibuzz after setting up Stealth Rock, switch into Blissey Trick then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

If opponent uses Bonemerang, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Use Trick, then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep. (Use Flamethrower vs. Gengar)
If opponent switches out into Gyarados, switch into Poliwrath then switch into Blissey Stealth Rock. Switch into Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed. Always use Iron Head vs. Gengar

Switch into Blissey Trick then switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep. (Houndoom is not dead, use Flamethrower vs. Gengar)

Stealth Rock;
If opponent uses Hydro Pump, switch into Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum then sweep (Use Earthquake vs. Gengar)

If opponent switches out into Houndoom, use Trick then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
